segments.text: Yes . I ’ m trying to find a pair of earrings to match my necklace . Can you recommend some to me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Your gold necklace has a diamond pendant , and your eardrops should be
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: These look wonderful . Do these come with a guarantee of quality ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . If there is anything wrong with them , you can come back and show me the guarantee of quality , and then you will surely get free service .
segments.speaker: S1
